message: Let's be reasonable, Bob. This gives me a slight advantage, but we both win something.
I think a more even split is fairer. This offer gives you a chance to get a little more than what you offered in the last round.
Bob, let's stop wasting time. The longer this goes on, the less we both get. A 50/50 split is the fairest and most logical outcome. Take it before inflation eats away at our potential gains!
